cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent

Class ControllersManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.agent.ControllersManager

  • public class ControllersManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all the controllers. Its main purpose can be to manage dire and radiant team contexts, manage the context, load agents and spread the incoming updates between them.
    Author:
    kocur

      • resetInstance

        public static ControllersManager resetInstance()
        Will override the instance. So this will clear the agents etc.
        Returns:
        Returns a new instance of this class.

      • load

        public boolean load()
        Loads the agents.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all the agents were loaded succesfully and if there was at least one agent..

      • checkTeamContext

        private boolean checkTeamContext()
        Check that the team contexts are ok. There must be exactly 1 player.
        Returns:
        Returns true, if team context is correctly set.

      • initializeAgents

        public void initializeAgents()
        Initializes the agents.

      • handle

        public Response handle(RequestArguments arg)
        Passes the incoming request to correct team context and agent's controller.
        Parameters:
        arg - RequestArguments that contain message, method and agent'sName.
        Returns:
        Returns a response from agent's controller.

      • chatEvent

        public Response chatEvent(ChatEvent e)
        Handle chat event. For now just send the events to all wrappers and they can handle them. [this might change]
        Parameters:
        e - ChatEvent
        Returns:
        Returns response for chat event. Now I return empty one, but in future this might be needed.

      • handleSelectedAgent

        public Response handleSelectedAgent(java.lang.String msg)
        Handles BotsSelected request. == Assigns in-game ids to agent wrappers.
        Parameters:
        msg - Body of the request.
        Returns:
        Returns response to that request. Empty message with OK status if everything goes according to plan.

      • areAgentsSelected

        public boolean areAgentsSelected()
        Returns true if the selection is done.
        Returns:
        True if all agents were selected.

      • getControllerWrapperWithName

        public ControllerWrapper getControllerWrapperWithName(java.lang.String name)
        Finds agent with supplied name and returns it.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the agent we want to find.
        Returns:
        BotWrapper of agent with supplied name or null.
